messages.subject: Elizabeth Haydon, another great writer
messages.msgSnippet: Tia asked about Elizabeth Haydon, who I mentioned in my last post. She is a fantasy writer-put the writer before the fantasy because she is extremely
messages.messageBody:
Tia asked about Elizabeth Haydon, who I mentioned in my last post. She is a
fantasy writer-put the "writer" before the "fantasy" because she is
extremely talented.
Her first book is called "Rhapsody", and it's the first of a trilogy. It's
got a lot to offer---action, steamy romance, magic, weird otherworld
creatures, and a female protagonist who kicks butt.
"Requiem for the Sun" is her fourth. You can read a sample at
http://www.elizabethhaydon.com


Hikaru
